DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy of SPD489 when used as augmentation to an antidepressant in the treatment of major depressive disorder (MDD) as measured by mean change in total Montgomery-Çºsberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS) scores.
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Study of SPD489 in Adults With Major Depressive Disorder (MDD) as Augmentation Therapy to an Antidepressant
DOC.criteria: Adults aged 1855 with a primary diagnosis of nonpsychotic MDD History of nonresponse to multiple antidepressants
